extendedInfo.description: Rush Down is a doodle style falling down game with intutive game rule. Your ultra mission to reach the deepest place of stick man's world!# Tilt your phone to control falling route of stick man. # Collect coins/items as many as possible so that you can POWERUP and upgrade your AVATAR. # Avoid spike, spur, lightning, and ghost on the journey which will hurt you. Tilt your phone now, and rush down to see how deep that you will reach! Don't forget to submit your score to rock global 24 hour hot leaderboard!

reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!
reviews.comment: I love this it is very addicting and works great on my LG Enlight ... Get this app and you will have fun.

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gotta love it!
reviews.comment: Love the game and the simple concept, keeps me coming back for more. However, there are two achievements that i know I\'ve gotten (superman and i can\'t stop flying) but the game doesn\'t recognize it no matter how i go about it. And sometimes the screen goes faster than the canon and you think you\'re further down only to find you\'re at the top of the screen and caught by the upper bound.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Quite good fun but also a challenge for pro gamers
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Game is incredibly addictive! Spent hours playing it and still can\'t stop! Does have one bug tho. When you go through the cannon thing, after it shoots you through a number of floors, sometimes it stops you right on the top of the screen and you get squished instead of stopping you on a lower level. Hope the developers understand what i just said :-))

reviews.comment: I would like more abilities, and more levels, plus challenges. Otherwise great!
